actions.in_committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.4820.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade and on the Great Lakes and their tributary and connecting waters in trade with Canada for each of 3 barges.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue certificates of documentation for three named barges for employment in the coastwise trade and on the Great Lakes and their tributary and connecting waters in trade with Canada.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade and on the Great Lakes and their tributary and connecting waters in trade with Canada for each of 3 barges.
